content:
I've added the shampoo to the list. Don't worry about the exact amount for the kibble, we can come back to that later if you remember.

Here's the updated list:

1. Dog bed from PetSmart - $40
2. Stainless steel food bowl from Amazon - $15
3. Grain-free kibble (one-time purchase, amount TBD)
4. Measuring cup from local pet store - $5
5. Shampoo from the vet - $10

What about vet visits or any preventative care for Max, like flea and tick medication or heartworm prevention? Have you purchased any of those recently?
